explains: n. 学得，习得；（金钱、财物等的）获取；购买，添置，增添物；收购，购置的产业
wordGroup: data acquisition system 数据采集系统；资料获取系统
merger and acquisition 收购兼并；兼并与收购
knowledge acquisition 知识获取；知识习得；知识获得；知识采集
information acquisition 信息获取；信息采集
target acquisition 自标探测，目标获取
acquisition cost 取得成本；购置成本
acquisition of land 收购土地
acquisition of assets 购置资产；资产的取得
data acquisition unit 数据采集器

sentences.en: Indeed, ease of acquisition is the problem.
sentences.cn: 事实上，容易获得是个问题。

sentences.en: He devotes his time to the acquisition of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他把时间用在获取知识上。

sentences.en: His second hypothesis is the natural order in the acquisition hypothesis.
sentences.cn: 他的第二个假说是习得学说中的自然秩序。
